    • Field Detail

      • space

        public repast.simphony.space.continuous.ContinuousSpace<java.lang.Object> space

    • Constructor Detail

      • Provider

        public Provider(double qual,
                double priceMedCons,
                double capital,
                int capacity,
                boolean specialist,
                repast.simphony.space.continuous.ContinuousSpace<java.lang.Object> space,
                double extraCost)
        Parameters:
        qual - Quality indicator (1= perfect, 0=worst)
        priceMedCons - Base price of medical consultation
        capital - Initial capital of the provider
        capacity - Maximum number of appointments per week (e.g. 80 for 8hours/day with 2 patients per hour)
        specialist - Boolean for specialists
        space - Continuous space in which the model takes place
        extraCost - Non monetary costs (unit to be defined) //FIXME 99 define the unit of this

    • Method Detail

      • stepResetProvider

        public void stepResetProvider()
        This scheduled method resets some variable at the Provider level. For instance, the netIncome is added to the capital and reset. Various counters are reset to zero.

      • stepUpdateParameters

        public void stepUpdateParameters()
        This method carries out the optimisation of the provider in various variable. We use the PID-controller

      • appointment

        public MedicalConsultation appointment(Patient patient,
                                       double budget)
        This method handles the whole interaction between the doctor and the patient. The sequence of events is as follows:
        1. Based on a general assessment (proxied by health status) and the budget (defined by the insurance), the provider decides how much to invest in diagnostics
        2. For each medical condition
        3. -- The doctor gets a diagnosis (can be correct or wrong or null) getDiagnosis(healthABM.MedicalCondition, int, double). This information will be stored.
        4. -- -- If there is a diagnosis: provider searches a treatment selectTreatment(healthABM.Illness, double)
        5. -- -- -- If treatment found: assign it to the medical condition
        6. -- -- -- else: refer to a specialist
        7. Compute the cost of the appointment and the treatments: charge the patient and adds the income to the Provider
        Parameters:
        patient - The patient to be treated
        budget - The maximal amount of money the provider can charge. This value is the result of the out-of-pocket capabilities of the patient and the insurance plan. the patient has to compute this value before requesting the service.
        Returns:
        This method returns an object of class MedicalConsultation, which contains several pieces of information:
        • referral A provider is returned if the patient is referred to a specialist
        • priceToPatient total cost of the consultation (includes cost of consultation and the diagnosis, but not the cost of treatments!)

      • selectTreatment

        public Treatment selectTreatment(Illness diagnosis,
                                 double severity)
        This method selects the best treatment considering a series of elements such as the cost, cost-effectiveness, the marginal profit for the provider and the severity of the medical condition
        Parameters:
        diagnosis - diagnosed Illness
        severity - level of severity of the medical condition.
        Returns:
        returns the best treatment, and null if no treatment is available
